sen.e: Later, its scale gradually shrank until it became merely a troop of guards for the imperial palace, and even their function as guards was lost as times changed from the Muromachi period, period of Oda and Toyotomi, and to the Edo period, but despite the fact that it did not appear at all in the Kin Gate Incident when fire by war came closest to the imperial palace in modern history, it existed until the Meiji Restoration to describe family lineage.
